subject: Coaches and Managers
Hockey, Ice
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: The Sabres’ Lindy Ruff will become the 18th N.H.L. coach to reach 1,000 games, and join Al Arbour and Billy Reay as the only ones to do it with one team.
snippet: The Sabres’ Lindy Ruff will become the 18th N.H.L. coach to reach 1,000 games, and join Al Arbour and Billy Reay as the only ones to do it with one team.
